name: sratopn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cts, c0), cfv(cts, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(TopOpen ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c1))
⊣ (w0 →(Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
⊣ (w0 →(TopSet ` c0)=(TopSet ` c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cts, c0), cfv(cts, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(TopOpen ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c1))
⊣ (w0 →(Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
⊣ (w0 →(TopSet ` c0)=(TopSet ` c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
⊣ (w0 → c1 =((subringAlg ` c0)` c2))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆(Base ` c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cts, c0), cfv(cts, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(TopOpen ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c1))
⊣ (w0 →(TopSet ` c0)=(TopSet ` c1))
⊣ (w0 → c1 =((subringAlg ` c0)` c2))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆(Base ` c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cts, c0), cfv(cts, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(TopSet ` c0)=(TopSet ` c1))
⊣ (w0 → c1 =((subringAlg ` c0)` c2))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆(Base ` c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(TopOpen ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c1))
⊣ (w0 → c1 =((subringAlg ` c0)` c2))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆(Base ` c0))

comment: Topology component of a subring algebra. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)
